import React from "react"; import "./App.css"; import { render } from "react-dom"; import Navbar from './Navbar.js' import Footer from './Footer.js' import axios from 'axios'; class Comment extends React.Component { state = { movies: [] } componentDidMount() { const ID = this.props.location.state.id axios.get(`http://localhost:5000/api/movies/`+ID) .then(res => { const movies = res.data; this.setState({ movies }); }) } render() { return (
{this.state.records.map((data) => (
{data.description}

{data.name}


Releasing on:
{data.releaseDate}

Actors:
{data.actors}

Producer:
{data.Producer}

))}

Ratings & Reviews

Leave a comment
